# NINearbyObject.RemovalReason

**Enumeration**

The reason a session removed a nearby object.

## Declaration

```swift
enum RemovalReason
```

## Overview

Each case is a possible value of the `reason` argument to the delegate’s [doc://com.apple.nearbyinteraction/documentation/NearbyInteraction/NISessionDelegate/session(_:didRemove:reason:)] callback.

## Reasons

- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.peerEnded**: The peer ended the session.
- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.timeout**: NI timed out the session.
- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.peerEnded**: The peer ended the session.
- **NINearbyObject.RemovalReason.timeout**: NI timed out the session.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
title: NINearbyObject.RemovalReason
